author: pipermerriam
content: There was a call this morning on "State Expiry".  There are multiple things from today's call that are prime candidates for projects.  I made really rough notes in a few new "issues" in the cohort-zero repository.  I'd encourage everyone to check those out and to listen to the recording of today's call (see <#739145593762611250> channel and maybe ask <@!601121887141232672> ).  Some need for proo-of-concept implementations of things, some stuff that's data analytics on the current chain.

author: pipermerriam
content:
Also, weekly "stand up" calls will start next week:

- "Western" timezones Thursdays at 1530 UTC: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/?qm=1&lid=5419384,100,2643743,1668341&h=5419384&date=2021-6-16&sln=9.5-10&hf=1
- "Eastern" timezones Thursdays at 0330 UTC: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/?qm=1&lid=5419384,100,2643743,1668341&h=5419384&date=2021-6-16&sln=21.5-22&hf=1

Zoom calls will be published to this channel prior to the call.  If you know that you will be a regular attendee you can DM me **after** attending the first call for a calendar invite.

author: pipermerriam
content: Here is a good example of someone delivering a valuable analysis of a proposed EVM change: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/evm-mcopy-analysis
